page.title: 12RECREATION CIVIC WEEK
page.content: Each year in late June the Shotts Civic Week is held. A large number of events is organised :sporting,artistic,cultural. A sample programme is summarised here: THURSDAY-Art exhibition-Masonic Hall FRIDAY-Civic dinner dance-Co-op Hall SATURDAY- Treasure Hunt-Summer Fayre SUNDAY-Swop Shop,in association with Radio Clyde-Open Air Disco-Ladies Football Team vs. Showbiz X1-Pop Group -Side Shows and Stalls-Golf Finals MONDAY-Swimming Gala-Badminton Finals TUESDAY-"It's A Knockout"-Hannah Park WEDNESDAY-Salvation Army Concert -Schools Quiz THURSDAY-Grand Variety Show-Disco- Under Age Seven A Side Football FRIDAY-Combined Band Concert-Table Tennis Finals-Bowling Finals. See P12
